CardinalSubsetSelectionStrategy
ISubsetSelectionStrategy
public sealed
CardinalSubsetSelectionStrategy

Strategy for selecting a sub-set of items from a superset.  The number of items to select is a fixed number (the selection cardinality), unless the superset is smaller in which case all items in the superset are selected.

Variables
_selectCount
readonly int _selectCount
Functions

int selectCount
)

Construct with the given selection count (selection cardinality).

selectCount
